title: How to Get the Most Out of Your Products

steps.headline: When you're nearly at the end of your tube, start at the bottom of the tube and roll the it up, squeezing the toothpaste to the top as you go.
Hold in place with the peg.
steps.description: Alternatively, you can roll the contents that is in the bottom of the tube up to the top with a can of beans or peas, rolling pin or any heavy cylinder.

steps.headline: Store bottles with whatever end the contents comes out of on a surface, don't just chuck them in a drawer.

When the contents of the tube is nearly gone, try cutting the tube in half and either scooping out the leftovers with your hand or adding some water and shaking it a little to dilute the product and make it go further.
Buy cheap unscented shampoo, conditioner and shower cream/ bubble bath/ body wash etc.at the euro store or a chemists own brand.
If you have expensive or really good products, every time you use the expensive product, only use half of what is needed, then mix the cheap stuff in to make it go further!
Always buy tubs for stuff such as hand cream or body lotion or whatever, because they are easier to use every last bit, rather than tubes or bottles.

If nail polish has either dried up or the brush has gone hard or the top is clogged, then all you need to do is add about five or six drops of nail polish remover into the bottle, screw on the cap and shake vigorously for about a minute to a minute and a half.

If you have about six or seven bottles of body lotion or conditioner or shampoo or whatever in your closet or dumped in a drawer that are all half full or have one use left, then take the largest bottle and empty all the rest into it and shake until mixed thoroughly.

text: Toothpaste When you're nearly at the end of your tube, start at the bottom of the tube and roll the it up, squeezing the toothpaste to the top as you go.  Hold in place with the peg. Alternatively, you can roll the contents that is in the bottom of the tube up to the top with a can of beans or peas, rolling pin or any heavy cylinder.
